scripts.install-all: npx concurrently "npm install start --prefix mf-add-to-wishlist" "npm install --force --prefix mf-oauth" "npm install --prefix mf-products" "npm install --prefix mf-similar-products" "npm install --prefix mf-wishlist"
scripts.start-all: npx concurrently "npm run start --prefix mf-add-to-wishlist" "npm run start --prefix mf-oauth" "npm run start --prefix mf-products" "npm run start --prefix mf-similar-products" "npm run start --prefix mf-wishlist"
scripts.install-and-start: npm run install-all && npm run start-all
